title: Khawvela thil tinrengin
lyrics:
Khawvela thil tinrengin,
A chanchin thu an puang a;
Vana arsi zawng zawngin,
A enzia a lantir a;
Angel-in an chawimawi chiam a.

Rilru inngaitlawmte hnenah,
Krista a rawn inlar ta;
Imanuela kha,
Kan hnenah a lo cheng ta.

Chu hla mawi Jubili chu,
Mite thinlungah a thang;
A thu ropui tak mai chu,
Pitar, putar nauten,
Lawm takin an lo aupui a.

Tun hi hun lawmawm a ni,
Lal Krista lo pian ni hi;
Amah faka inkhawmin,
A hmangaihna hla sain,
Aw, khawvelin lo sawi nawn se.
